Name: Elle Loves
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of dried rose petals.
Garnish with rose petals floated on surface.
Review: Fruity, very slightly sweet and suitably pink in colour. Best made with a light white rum infused with a vanilla pod, rather than a commercially produced vanilla-flavoured rum.
History: Created 30th January 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room as a Valentine's Day cocktail for Elle Magazine .
Nutrition: One serving of Elle Loves contains 172 calories
